00029 /******************************************************************************
00030                                Definitions section
00031  ******************************************************************************/
00038 #define NWK_COMMON_HEADER_LENGTH 8U
00039 /* + Source IEEE Address (8 octet) + Dest IEEE Address (8 octet). */
00040 #define NWK_CUSTOM_HEADER_LENGTH (NWK_COMMON_HEADER_LENGTH + 8U + 8U)
00041 /* + multicast control field (1 octet). */
00042 #ifdef _CUSTOM_NWK_HEADER_
00043 #define NWK_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH (NWK_CUSTOM_HEADER_LENGTH + 1U)
00044 #else
00045 #define NWK_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH (NWK_COMMON_HEADER_LENGTH + 1U)
00046 #endif
00047 
00049 #if defined _SECURITY_
00050   #define NWK_AUXILIARY_HEADER_SIZE 14U
00051   #define NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH 4U
00052 #else
00053   #define NWK_AUXILIARY_HEADER_SIZE 0U
00054   #define NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH 0U
00055 #endif /* _SECURITY_ */
00056 
00059 #define NWK_CONCENTRATOR_RADIUS 8U /* hop */
00060 
00062 #define NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE (NWK_CONCENTRATOR_RADIUS)
00063 
00068 #if defined _NWK_SOURCE_ROUTING_
00069   #define NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE_SUBFRAME_LENGTH (2U+(2U*NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE))
00070 #else
00071   #define NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE_SUBFRAME_LENGTH 0U
00072 #endif /* _NWK_SOURCE_ROUTING_ */
00073 
00075 #define NWK_MAX_UNSECURE_HEADER_LEHGTH \
00076   (NWK_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH + NWK_MAX_SOURCE_ROUTE_SUBFRAME_LENGTH)
00077 
00078 #define NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LEHGTH \
00079   (NWK_MAX_UNSECURE_HEADER_LEHGTH + NWK_AUXILIARY_HEADER_SIZE)
00080 
00082 #define NWK_AFFIX_LENGTH (MAC_AFFIX_LENGTH + \
00083    NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LEHGTH + NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH)
00084 
00086 #define NWK_NSDU_OFFSET (MAC_MSDU_OFFSET + NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LEHGTH)
00087 
00089 #define NWK_MAX_NSDU_SIZE (MAC_MAX_MSDU_SIZE \
00090    - NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LEHGTH - NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH)
00091 
00093 #define NWK_MAX_RX_NSDU_SIZE (MAC_MAX_MSDU_SIZE - \
00094   (NWK_COMMON_HEADER_LENGTH + NWK_AUXILIARY_HEADER_SIZE + NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH))
00095 
00096 #define NWK_MAX_TX_NSDU_SIZE (MAC_MAX_MSDU_SIZE - \
00097   (NWK_COMMON_HEADER_LENGTH + NWK_AUXILIARY_HEADER_SIZE + NWK_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH))
00098 
00100 #define IS_BROADCAST_ADDR(A) (LE16_TO_CPU(A) >= 0xFFF8U)
00101 
00102 #define IS_CORRECT_SHORT_ADDR(A) (LE16_TO_CPU(A) < 0xFFF8U)
00103 
00105 #define LOW_POWER_ROUT_ADDR CCPU_TO_LE16(0xFFFBU)
00106 
00107 #define BROADCAST_ADDR_LOWPOWER_ROUTERS LOW_POWER_ROUT_ADDR
00108 
00110 #define ALL_ROUT_AND_COORD_ADDR CCPU_TO_LE16(0xFFFCU)
00111 
00112 #define BROADCAST_ADDR_ROUTERS ALL_ROUT_AND_COORD_ADDR
00113 
00115 #define RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE_ADDR CCPU_TO_LE16(0xFFFDU)
00116 
00117 #define BROADCAST_ADDR_RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE_ADDR
00118 
00120 #define ALL_DEVICES_IN_PAN_ADDR 0xFFFFU
00121 
00122 #define BROADCAST_ADDR_ALL ALL_DEVICES_IN_PAN_ADDR
00123 
00126 #define NWK_NO_SHORT_ADDR 0xFFFFU
00127 
00129 #define NWK_STOCHASTIC_REQ_SHORT_ADDR   0xFFFEU
00130 
00133 #define NWKC_MAX_BROADCAST_JITTER 2048U /*<! ~0x40 milliseconds in 2.4GHz */
00134 
00135 /* Maximum radius for non-member mode multicast frame. */
00136 #define NWK_MAX_NON_MEMBER_MULTICAST_RADIUS 7U
00137 
00141 #define NWK_NO_EXT_PANID 0ULL
00142 
00144 #define NWK_DEFINE_LEAVE_CONTROL_DEFAULT \
00145   {                                      \
00146     .cleanRouteTable    = 1U,            \
00147     .cleanNeighborTable = 1U,            \
00148     .cleanAddresmap     = 0U,            \
00149     .cleanKeyPairSet    = 0U,            \
00150     .cleanBindingTable  = 0U,            \
00151     .cleanGroupTable    = 0U,            \
00152     .cleanNwkSecKeys    = 0U,            \
00153     .silent             = 0U             \

00229   NWK_MAC_COUNTER_ERROR_STATUS       = 0xDB,
00233   NWK_MAC_IMPROPER_KEY_TYPE_STATUS   = 0xDC,
00237   NWK_MAC_IMPROPER_SECURITY_LEVEL_STATUS = 0xDD,
00241   NWK_MAC_UNSUPPORTED_LEGACY_STATUS   = 0xDE,
00244   NWK_MAC_UNSUPPORTED_SECURITY_STATUS = 0xDF,
00246   NWK_MAC_BEACON_LOSS_STATUS          = 0xE0,
00249   NWK_MAC_CHANNEL_ACCESS_FAILURE_STATUS = 0xE1,
00251   NWK_MAC_DENIED_STATUS               = 0xE2,
00253   NWK_MAC_DISABLE_TRX_FAILURE_STATUS  = 0xE3,
00257   NWK_MAC_FRAME_TOO_LONG_STATUS       = 0xE5,
00260   NWK_MAC_INVALID_GTS_STATUS          = 0xE6,
00263   NWK_MAC_INVALID_HANDLE_STATUS       = 0xE7,

00280   NWK_MAC_PAN_ID_CONFLICT_STATUS      = 0xEE,
00282   NWK_MAC_REALIGNMENT_STATUS          = 0xEF,

00286   NWK_MAC_TRANSACTION_OVERFLOW_STATUS = 0xF1,

00293   NWK_MAC_UNAVAILABLE_KEY_STATUS      = 0xF3,
00296   NWK_MAC_UNSUPPORTED_ATTRIBUTE_STATUS = 0xF4,
00299   NWK_MAC_INVALID_ADDRESS_STATUS      = 0xF5,
00302   NWK_MAC_ON_TIME_TOO_LONG_STATUS     = 0xF6,
00306   NWK_MAC_PAST_TIME_STATUS            = 0xF7,
00310   NWK_MAC_TRACKING_OFF_STATUS         = 0xF8,
00313   NWK_MAC_INVALID_INDEX_STATUS        = 0xF9,
00315   NWK_MAC_LIMIT_REACHED_STATUS        = 0xFA,
00318   NWK_MAC_READ_ONLY_STATUS            = 0xFB,
